p: Immature Ae. aegypti (larvae and pupae) were collected in Noumea in November 2016. Larvae and pupae were reared to adult forms which were maintained at 28 ± 1°C, 80 ± 10% relative humidity and 12:12h light:dark cycle, with access to 10% sucrose solution ad libitum. F1 generation was produced by sib-mating and collective oviposition following blood feeding.
